programme.desc: Sleeper: When Phil fails to stay home and wait for the repairman, he tells an elaborate lie to hide the truth from Claire, but the stress is more than he can take. (S5 Ep21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Property Division Collision: Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny attempt to divide up all their possessions. It doesn't go well. (S10 Ep10)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Birthday Synchronicity: Sheldon and Amy try to celebrate her birthday with an intimate night at home but are interrupted when Bernadette goes into labour. (S10 Ep11)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Holiday Summation: After spending Christmas apart, the gang gather at Penny and Leonard's flat and hear about Sheldon and Amy's terrible trip to Texas. (S10 Ep12)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: German for Beginners and a Crazy Old Man with a Bat: The gambling room gets broken into. Sheldon wants to study abroad. And Missy makes a new friend. (S6 Ep20)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Romantic Getaway and a Germanic Meat-Based Diet: Mandy surprises Georgie with a spa weekend and Sheldon prepares for his summer in Germany. (S6 Ep21)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Snow Ball: Manny and Luke organise the school's lavish winter dance but end up in over their heads due to a texting error. Can they fix it before the end of the night? (S8 Ep9)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Ringmaster Keifth: Cam tries to make up for his Thanksgiving debacle by hosting a New Year feast. And Phil's not sure how to feel about his dad dating his childhood babysitter. (S8 Ep10)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Three Gays of the Condo: After realising that Marge only married him because she was pregnant with Bart, Homer moves out and ends up sharing an apartment with two gay men. (S14 Ep17/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Dude, Where's My Ranch?: After Homer has a hit record with an anti-Ned Flanders Christmas carol, the family decide to get away from it all at a ranch. (S14 Ep18/22)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proposal Proposal: Amy must decide whether or not to marry Sheldon and gives him an answer to his proposal. Howard and Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news. (S11 Ep1)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Retraction Reaction: Leonard angers the university during an embarrassing interview. Amy and Bernadette must hide their success from Sheldon and Howard. (S11 Ep2)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Relaxation Integration: Amy tries to convince Sheldon that he has a more laid-back side. Raj and Stuart compete to woo Bernadette's new colleague Ruchi. (S11 Ep3)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Last of the Red Hat Mamas: Marge joins a women's group after Homer humiliates her at a party and her old friends shun her. But are her new friends all they seem to be? (S17 Ep7/22)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Clare's sinister plan unravels when a daring escape throws everything into chaos. Cleo's baby news sparks tension and rifts. And a bombshell from the past stops Grace in her tracks.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Kill the Alligator and Run: Homer thinks he only has four years to live. So he takes the family on holiday to Florida, but does something foolish and gets into big trouble... (S11 Ep19/22)

programme.title: New: Below Deck
programme.desc: Brand new series - New Capt, New Rules: Captain Kerry Titheradge takes control of the 197-foot St David as he greets his crew - faces old and new - off the coast of Grenada. (S11 Ep1/17)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: On the box this time: The Piano, Married at First Sight Australia, MILF Manor, Wild Isles, Match of the Day - with no commentators - and the News on Gary Lineker. (S21 Ep4)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britain's sharpest armchair critics watch Wild Isles, Rise and Fall, Challenge Anneka, Race Across the World and The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up To Cancer. (S21 Ep5)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: PR exec Claudia, who's 26, looks for a date who won't give her the ick. And 71-year-old music producer Barry dates a former member of a pop group. (S13 Ep5)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Jerusalem Duality: Sheldon's confidence is shaken to the core by a 15-year-old physicist who is clearly much brighter than him. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bat Jar Conjecture: Sheldon is ousted from the gang's Physics Bowl quiz team, so he decides to prove his superiority by forming his own team for the event. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin is convinced his mojo was in a cap he gave away in 'Mojo Missing', then in 'Who's The Animal', Alvin finds himself mistaken for a Tasmanian devil during a costume visit to the zoo. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.desc: The kids try to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal in 'Dine and Bash', then in 'Sofa, So Good', the kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning. (S6, ep 8)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge in 'The Last Laugh', then in 'Driver's Dread', Leni looks for alternative ways to get her driver's licence. (S6, ep 9)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: Legends of the Hidden Temple

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Massage Chair: When Captain Man shows up with a cool new massage chair, Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper compete in a series of physical and mental challenges to see who wins the chair. (S5, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Victorious

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thunder Van: Hank brings the Thundervan for Phoebe to continue her superhero training, but when the kids take a joyride, Hank gives them a ride they will never forget. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Four Supes and a Baby: Phoebe drags Billy and Nora to the park to meet her crush and his baby brother. When Max takes the younger kids home, they accidentally grab the wrong one! (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Space Rock: Trouble follows Henry home from his superhero life when a piece of rock from outer space turns out to be more than it seems. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries

programme.desc: Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual).

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: The Sword Part 2: When Catra, Adora's best friend in the Fright Zone, leads an attack on Thaymor, our three heroes must work together to save the unarmed village. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Out of Step: Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted dancing shoes. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: What's Up Watzie: Frankie doesn't want Watzie to migrate with other dragons, so she sets up activities for him to do instead. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: Explosion Berries: Lost and alone on the surface of a world she's never before seen, Kipo must find her way back to her burrow with the help of a hardened surface survivor named Wolf. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Darkblade: After losing the municipal election, D'Argencourt gets akumatized into 'Darkblade.' (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo
programme.desc: Power Paws: Spotting an opportunity during a power sapping eclipse of the moon, the Guardians decide to raid Luca's lair. Unfortunately, Luca isn't the only one whose powers are offline. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Stretched Too Thin: Axel literally overstretched Masko, and now the toy can't go back to his original shape! He is completely demoralised, but what if the mind was the real key? (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Freaky Frequency / The Case of the Tricky Trimathlon: When the ice-cream shop loses business because customers can't lock their cars, the Inbestigators must uncover why! (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Curious New Girl / The Case of the Disappearing Deliveries: Maudie solves a playground robbery on her first day at school. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Miraculous Mini Golfer / The Case of the Problematic Party: Convinced a customer is cheating to claim a prize, Charlie hires the Inbestigators. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Kung Fu Sock
programme.desc: Animal Shelter Encounter: Tee Zeng takes a wrong sock with her again to the school field trip. Traumatised from the last time, Kung Fu Sock tries to catch up with her. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Wishmaker: As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to make people live their childhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes. (S4 Ep18)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Fin-loose: The Mermicornos meet a community of fish who have banned dancing, but Nautique shakes things up by teaching a rebellious kid to dance. (S1 Ep111)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Best Friends: Draculaura and Toralei are magically stuck together on Ghoul Spirit Day while Clawdeen and Frankie track down a Codex. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Scareer Day: On Scareer Day, Heath and his dad Hades must work together to save the school from a swarm of vicious pixies. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Stone Alone: Deuce prepares for a trip but his twin sisters try to scare him out of the idea, thinking he can't be independent. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Horsin' Around: Clawd must evade Bloodgood's horse, Nightmare, to catch the Blood Thirsty Bandit who's been stealing talismans. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Interference: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner, but his meal is interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy finds that the true 'interference' is down to the lemmings. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Lock and Key: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Blues: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. (S1 Ep62)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Augmented Bear: The Lemmings have discovered a new game: an augmented reality program on the ranger's digital tablet. (S1 Ep64)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Under Pressure: The only edible food left in the ranger's cabin is a salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice in the freezer. Grizzy decides to melt the ice with the blow-dryer. (S1 Ep65)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings in Space: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fireworks. (S1 Ep66)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Kami's Race: When Team Mirage breaks into Whale's office and steals a baby genie called Kami, he escapes and takes refuge with the Tikis. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Race for the Khepri: Motivated to win the race by catching the Khepri, Enki finds a very effective yet dangerous solution that could severely affect team Bee's drone. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Jade Armor

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...

programme.title: The Golden Disc
programme.desc: 1958. Pop drama starring Lee Patterson, Mary Steele, Terry Dene & Linda Gray. A young pop composer and singer opens a coffee bar. They are joined by budding singer Terry Dene as himself. [S]

programme.title: Somewhere in Camp

programme.title: Forces' Sweetheart

programme.title: Blackout

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: Desert Sands

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Come Back, Shame. 1966. Stars Adam West, Burt Ward & Cliff Robertson. Batman and Robin reckon something's up when Shame steals Grimaldi Smith's hot racing car in the middle of the Gotham City 500. [S]

programme.title: Yellow Sky
programme.desc: 1948. Western. Directed by William Wellman. Stars Gregory Peck, Anne Baxter & Richard Widmark. Outlaws seeking refuge find a ghost town inhabited by a girl and her grandfather who have found gold. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories

programme.title: The Footage Detectives

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend

programme.title: The Best of Benny Hill
